title: Worst Champ Release I've ever seen
body: Literally never seen a champion this unbalanced.  Can't wait to see her 100% pick/ban at worlds.

replies.body: Weren't release Rengar and Darius absolute abominations?

> [{quoted}](name=OurLestrade,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4trnAqck,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-24T00:17:49.193+0000)
>
> Weren't release Rengar and Darius absolute abominations?

I wasn't around for those. But to date Rengar hasn't ever been addressed and the rework was just a fucking joke. I think the only reason we don't see champs like those at worlds is because they don't want them nerfed lol.

Can you imagine the number of penta's a fed darius would get at worlds?

Rengar wouldn't be so bad since they'd actually ward... but still, he'd be pretty brutal.
Yes, because the pro's dont play to win....
Darius was played at worlds plenty after the Juggernaut update.

> [{quoted}](name=ReadyxPlayerxOne,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4trnAqck,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-24T00:16:40.456+0000)
>
> Literally never seen a champion this unbalanced.  Can&#039;t wait to see her 100% pick/ban at worlds.

Nothing particularly imbalanced about Camille tbh. She has plenty of counters and clear counterplay in her kit. The mobility might be a bit too much, but other than that she isn't that great.
{{champion:36}} try it.  counters most of the annoying champions top lane.

> [{quoted}](name=LesVitesses,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4trnAqck,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-24T00:19:58.624+0000)
>
> Nothing particularly imbalanced about Camille tbh. She has plenty of counters and clear counterplay in her kit. The mobility might be a bit too much, but other than that she isn't that great.

Yeah... you're a funny guy. This has to be a complete troll comment.
He isn't wrong. Every champion has counters to them. Once you learn them you can improve. Otherwise you just end up like a crybaby and make posts like this.
He's isn't wrong about there being clear counterplay.

Do you do anything except make salty bait threads?

Play a game, get destroyed.
Make a salty cry-thread about whoever beat you being broken, in order to deny the fact you just got fairly flattened (going by your match history and op.gg).

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4trnAqck,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-24T00:35:25.303+0000)
>
> Do you do anything except make salty bait threads?
> 
> Play a game, get destroyed.
> Make a salty cry-thread about whoever beat you being broken, in order to deny the fact you just got fairly flattened (going by your match history and op.gg).

You anything but a rude beach or troll?

Look; See all the ragebaby tears? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/ReadyxPlayerxOne

Get a life. maybe get a job (assuming you are old enough, anyone afraid to spell "bitch" properly still has delusions that mommy can spy on them), or find some other way to use time aside from being a pathetic flamer.
